i.detail: A tile labyrinth covers the floor
i.summary: A tile labyrinth covers the floor

n.detail: A briny odor fills the corridor
n.summary: A briny odor fills the corridor

r.detail: Skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the walls

s.detail: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls
s.summary: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls

v.detail: A 10-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor
v.summary: A 10-foot wide chasm cuts across the corridor

w.detail: The walls here have been engraved with endless spirals

z.detail:
Net Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 10 save or become restrained

details.history: The dungeon was created by worshippers of a good deity as a treasure vault. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)

detail.room_features: An altar of evil sits in the north side of the room, and a stream of acid flows down the east wall

east.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 15 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp) (slides up)

west.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

detail.room_features: A chute falls into the room from above, and a charred club lies in the east side of the room

south.desc: Secret (DC 15 to find) Trapped and Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
south.secret: A bookcase and concealed door pivots smoothly
south.trap:
Magic Missle Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    one target, 1d10 force damage

west.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 15 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp) (slides up)

south.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp) (slides down)

north.desc: Secret (DC 15 to find) Trapped and Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

Magic Missle Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    one target, 1d10 force damage

south.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

monster: Treasure: 1700 cp, 1300 sp, 20 gp, a steel cup engraved with dwarven axeheads (25 gp), a wooden coffer inlaid with a meandros of silver (25 gp), an earthenware bowl embossed with draconic runes (25 gp), an earthenware vase painted with floral imagery (25 gp)
detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "The red dragon is not a dragon" in blood on the east wall, and several pieces of blood-soaked clothing are scattered throughout the room

north.desc: Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

detail.room_features: Several headless statues are scattered throughout the room, and a pile of iron blobs lies in the north-east corner of the room

trap:
Concealed Pit: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets entering a 10 ft. square area, DC 14 save or take 2d10 damage

north.desc: Locked Iron Door (DC 10 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

detail.room_features: Spirals of white stones cover the floor, and lit candles are scattered across the floor

east.desc: Trapped Iron Portcullis (DC 20 to lift, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
east.trap:
Contact Poison: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects each creature which touches the trigger, DC 12 save or take 2d10 damage

north.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)
Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp) (slides up)

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 25 to find) Locked Iron Chest (DC 15 to unlock, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

2700 cp, 1400 sp, 50 gp, 2 x banded agate (10 gp), eye agate (10 gp), rhodochrosite (10 gp), turquoise (10 gp), Oil of Slipperiness (uncommon, dmg 184), Potion of Animal Friendship (uncommon, dmg 187), Potion of Greater Healing (uncommon, dmg 187), Potion of Water Breathing (uncommon, dmg 188)
trap:
Earthmaw Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 20 to disable;
    +12 to hit against one target, 4d10 piercing damage

detail.room_features: A stone ramp ascends towards the east wall, and a warped spear lies in the center of the room

detail.room_features: A narrow shaft falls into the room from above, and spirals of red stones cover the floor

monster: Goblin Boss (cr 1, mm 166) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp

settings.name: The Dark Crypts of Nimundo the Lunatic

wandering_monsters.1: Goblin Boss (cr 1, mm 166) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, tracking the party
wandering_monsters.2: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
wandering_monsters.3: Goblin Boss (cr 1, mm 166) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, tracking the party
wandering_monsters.4: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.5: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.6: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, consumed by disease and madness
